bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Authenticated Encryption With Length Expansion for Storage Device
IEEE Draft Standard for Authenticated Encryption With Length Expansion for Storage Device
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Approved Draft Std P1619.1/D24, Oct 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies cryptographic and data authentication procedures for storage devices that support length-expansion, such as tape drives. Such procedures include the following cryptographic modes of operation for the AES block cipher: CCM, GCM, CBC-HMAC, and XTS-HMAC.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
